original_title: LA Pink: A XXX Porn Parody
overview: A hilarious erotic tale about tattoos, pizza, insatiable sex drives, and the challenges of being a female entrepreneur in a male-dominated world. As the proprietor of her own tattoo parlor, Joanna Von Angel has hired some of the sexiest artists in the industry to be a part of her staff; and between Joanna and the girls at the shop, it soon becomes obvious that they give the best tattoos - and the best blowjobs - in town... Well, other than the shop's only male tattoo artist, Brian Street Team, who can't seem to get a customer no matter how hard he tries.
title: LA Pink: A XXX Porn Parody
